refnamediv.refpurpose: combines the two programs showtherm and ir-X

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTIONS
refsect1.para: pictx is an interactive program that combines the two programs showtherm and ir-X. Ultimately it can read a temperature output file and display the image on the screen without having the user call two different programs.
pictx is designed to be run in an X-windows environment since it does call the program ir-X.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLE
refsect1.para: The following is an example from an interactive session.

The program ir-X is now being run. If option 0 or 1 was used when the name of a file is asked for enter the name of the file that was just stored.
